author: smuzaffar
body: This is follow up of #39396 . It is not complete backport of #39396 as 12.4.X does not include all changes for these package. This PR just proposes to move the private headers of `L1Trigger/Phase2L1GMT` in to its plugin directory and cleanup of some unused include statements
title: [12.4.X] Move Phase2L1GMT private headers in to plugins dir
